column1: Little Goat Diner////I went here for lunch today and waited about 30 minutes for a table to be ready. Upon receiving the text that a table was ready
column2: the hostess required us to wait an additional 10 minutes until the table was actually ready. When I was finally seated
column3: I waited at my table for another 15 minutes. During this time
column4: no one from the waitstaff approached our table and we decided to leave... Though I'm sure the food is great!
